title: Richelieu Dennis on New Voices Fund, Essence Ventures
description: Richelieu Dennis, Founder and Chair of The Sundial Group of Companies, discusses the New Voices Fund, the challenges of raising capital and what’s next for ESSENCE. He tells Romaine Bostick on “The Close” that today’s entrepreneurial landscape has constraints but also meaningful opportunities. (Source: Bloomberg)
